page.title: 17Brinsley Primary School
page.content: School is a happy and busy place for children age 5 years to 11 years with a pre-school Nursery for children aged three to five years.The children do a lot of varied work from clay to science,music to maths.We enjoy doing Drama and every term each class has a class assembly when we invite all the mum's and dad's grandma's,grandads, sisters and brothers to come and see our assembly,have a cup of coffee and look around classrooms and talk with the teacher.We have lots of mums who come in on a regular weekly basis to help with all kinds of work around school.We have lots of events,sports days,discos for parents,social evenings following for example youth hostel visits.Children work very hard and we are very much part of our local community.
